thread.title: Great central hotel, lovely staff
thread.title_full: Great central hotel, lovely staff - Review of Hilton London Angel Islington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: 913beverleyw
title: Great central hotel, lovely staff
text: The hotel is very near to Angel Tube station and the bus stops are a few minutes walk. The Business Design Centre is next door and shops and restaurants are a few minutes walk away. The hotel is clean and the staff are very welcoming. if you choose to have breakfast there is an extensive choice and all served with a smile.
